department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Visual Music
course.meeting_text: Th., 11:30–1 and a weekly film screening W., 1–3
course.description: A new course that explores the history of visual music throughout the 20th century and across different media. Our topics will range from early avant-garde films and Disney ani-mations to post-war art scenes and pioneers of electronic music to a survey of jukebox films and music videos. By bridging the gap between experimental and popular approaches to visual music, this course will provide a multi-layered history of the inter-relations between film, video, animation, and music.
course.notes: This course has an additional weekly film screening Wednesday, 1-3 pm.
